Constructor Detail

MP3VoteFactory

public MP3VoteFactory(MP3Parameters param,
                      java.lang.String hashAlgorithm,
                      java.util.Random r,
                      boolean validity)
Initializes a MarkPledge3VoteFactory

Parameters:
param - MarkPledgeParameters used in the vote encryption. The randomness source of the public key in the MarkPledge parameters MUST have already been initialized. If not initialized the default SecureRandom implementation will be used for the random encryption factors generation.
hashAlgorithm - hash algorithm to be used as a commitment scheme to the vote encryption
r - randomness source

MP3VoteFactory

public MP3VoteFactory(MP3Parameters param,
                      java.lang.String hashAlgorithm,
                      boolean validity)
Initializes a MarkPledge3VoteFactory. It uses the default SecureRandom provider as randomness source

Parameters:
param - MarkPledgeParameters used in the vote encryption. The randomness source of the public key in the MarkPledge parameters MUST have already been initialized. If not initialized the default SecureRandom implementation will be used for the random encryption factors generation.
hashAlgorithm - hash algorithm to be used as a commitment scheme to the vote encryption

getVoteAndReset

public final MP3VoteAndReceipt getVoteAndReset(java.math.BigInteger challenge,
                                               int selectionIndex)
This method return the MarkPledge3 vote and receipt from the prepared vote

Parameters:
challenge - the challenge to the prepared vote encryption
selectionIndex - the selected candidate index (0 to number of candidates -1)
Returns:
a MarkPledge 3 vote and receipt
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if no prepared vote exists

getVoteAndReset

public final MP3VoteAndReceipt getVoteAndReset(int selectionIndex)
THIS METHOD SHOULD ONLY BE USED FOR TEST PROGRAMS because the challenge is internally generated. The method return the MarkPledge3 vote and receipt from the prepared vote The challenge is randomly selected using this object random number generator

Parameters:
selectionIndex - the selected candidate index
Returns:
a MarkPledge 3 vote and receipt
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if no prepared vote exists

getPreparedVoteHash

public final byte[] getPreparedVoteHash()
                                 throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
This method returns the hash of the encryptions of the prepared vote (no random factors, nor verification values)

Returns:
the hash of the prepared vote (only candidate vote and commit encryptions are considered)
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
java.lang.NullPointerException - if no prepared vote exists
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the HASH_ALGORITHM is not supported

getCandideVotesHash

public static final byte[] getCandideVotesHash(MP3CandidateVoteEncryption[] candidateVotes,
                                               java.lang.String hashAlgorithm)
                                        throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
This method returns the hash of an array of MP3CandidateVoteEncryptions. It takes into account only the encryption of the candidate vote (X and Y) and the encryption of the commit value (X and Y) and following this order. The X and Y BigInteger components of the encryptions are transformed to byte arrays using the method toByteArray of the BigInteger class.

Parameters:
candidateVotes - the MarkPledge3 candidate vote encryption array
hashAlgorithm - the hash algorithm
Returns:
the hash value
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the hashAlgorithm is not supported
